summary: A TensorFlow training script that builds, trains, and evaluates a Deep Graph Infomax (DGI) model on standard citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) using DGL utilities. It parses command‑line arguments, constructs the DGI encoder and a downstream classifier, runs the unsupervised training loop, and reports classification accuracy.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to apply unsupervised graph representation learning for node classification, providing a ready‑to‑run example that can be adapted for research or production pipelines involving graph neural networks.
